debug_text.text: '[GalaxyTrader MK3] Trading AI system initializing...'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3] Trading AI system initialized'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Trade search already in progress, ignoring duplicate request'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') AI trade request received for ' + $ship.knownname + ' (MaxBuy: ' + $requestData.$MaxBuy + ', MaxSell: ' + $requestData.$MaxSell + ')'
'[GT-AI] Search lock auto-cleaned for ' + parent.$lockedShip.idcode

event_object_signalled.comment: Handle sell request from AI script

debug_text.text: '[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') AI sell request received for ' + $ship.knownname + ' (cargo full)'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3] AI script started for ship ' + $ship.knownname + ' - registering with MD system'

event_object_order_ready.comment: Detect when ship is ready for new order

debug_text.text: '[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Ship order ready: ' + $ship.knownname
'[GalaxyTrader MK3] ' + $ship.knownname + ' pilot ' + $ship.pilot.name + ' is blocked for training'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Adding ' + $ship.knownname + ' to trading queue. Queue size: ' + global.$GT_TradingQueue.$Ships.count
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Ship ' + $ship.knownname + ' pilot ' + ($ship.pilot? and $ship.pilot.name or 'NONE') + ' is blocked from trading'

'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Ship ' + $ship.knownname + ' not eligible for trading (registered: ' + (global.$GT_Ships.{$ship}? == true) + ', player owned: ' + $ship.isplayerowned + ', purpose: ' + $ship.primarypurpose + ')'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] ProcessTradingQueue called. Queue size: ' + global.$GT_TradingQueue.$Ships.count + ', Processing: ' + global.$GT_TradingQueue.$Processing
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] Starting batch processing of ' + global.$GT_TradingQueue.$Ships.count + ' ships'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Processing ship ' + ($processed + 1) + '/' + $toProcessCount + ': ' + $ship.knownname
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Skill-based trade search delay: ' + $penaltyDelay + ' (Skill: ' + $skillLevel + ')'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Ship ' + $ship.knownname + ' is not operational (exists: ' + $ship.exists + ', operational: ' + $ship.isoperational + ')'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] ' + global.$GT_TradingQueue.$Ships.count + ' ships remaining in queue, continuing processing'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] Trading queue is now empty'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] Queue already processing or empty (Processing: ' + global.$GT_TradingQueue.$Processing + ', Size: ' + global.$GT_TradingQueue.$Ships.count + ')'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Applying pre-search delay: ' + $delayTime
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Skipping trade search after delay; ship no longer operational'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Search parameters: MinROI=' + $minROI + '%, MinAbsoluteProfit=' + ($minAbsoluteProfit / 100) + ' Cr'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Using AI script distance limits: MaxBuy=' + $aiParams.$MaxBuy + ', MaxSell=' + $aiParams.$MaxSell + ', using max=' + $maxDistance + ' jumps'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Cleaned up old AI parameters (age: ' + ((player.age - $aiParams.$RequestTime) / 1s) + 's)'

'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') No AI params, using pilot ' + $ship.pilot.name + ' max jumps: ' + $pilotMaxJumps + ', trade distance: ' + $maxDistance + ' (config max: ' + $configMax + ')'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') No pilot found, using fallback distance: ' + $maxDistance + ' jumps'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3] Invalid ship for trading: ' + $ship.knownname

set_value.name: $factionPriorityText
set_value.exact: if $factionPriority == 0 then 'Player Only' else if $factionPriority == 1 then 'Foreign First' else 'Equal Priority'

debug_text.text:
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') === TRADE SEARCH START ===' + '
Ship: ' + $ship.knownname + '
Pilot: ' + $pilotInfo + '
Current Sector: ' + $ship.sector.knownname + '
Max Distance: ' + $maxDistance + ' jumps' + '
Min ROI: ' + $minROI + '%' + '
Min Absolute Profit: ' + ($minAbsoluteProfit / 100) + ' Cr' + '
Ship Cargo: ' + ($ship.cargo.capacity.all - $ship.cargo.free.all) + '/' + $ship.cargo.capacity.all
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Checking trade cache (' + @global.$GT_TradeCache.keys.count + ' wares cached, age: ' + ($cacheAge/1s) + 's)'

do_if.value: not $wareCache? or typeof $wareCache != datatype.table or not $wareCache.keys?
not $sellCache? or typeof $sellCache != datatype.table or not $sellCache.keys?
global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$Enabled and global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$TradeSearch and global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$LogLevel ge 2

debug_text.text: '[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âš¡ CACHE EARLY EXIT: Sell station ' + $sellKey.knownname + ' too far (' + $distanceToSell + ' > ' + $maxDistance + '), skipping all routes from this station'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âš¡ CACHE EARLY EXIT: Found ' + $validCachedTrades.count + ' good trades after checking ' + $cacheEntriesChecked + ' cache entries'

do_if.value: not $cacheEntry.$BuyOffer.owner? or not $cacheEntry.$BuyOffer.owner.exists or not $cacheEntry.$SellOffer.owner? or not $cacheEntry.$SellOffer.owner.exists
global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$Enabled and global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$TradeSearch and global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$LogLevel ge 2

debug_text.text: '[GT-CACHE] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âŒ Cached trade deleted (station no longer exists): ' + $wareKey.name + ' route invalidated'

do_if.value: global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$Enabled and global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$TradeSearch and global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$LogLevel ge 2

debug_text.text: '[GT-CACHE] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âŒ Cached trade deleted (below threshold): ROI=' + $cachedROI + '% (need ' + $cacheProfitThreshold + '%), removing from cache'

do_if.value: global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$Enabled and global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$TradeSearch and global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$LogLevel ge 3

debug_text.text: '[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') â›” CACHE: Trade route too long (' + $totalDistance + ' jumps > max ' + $maxDistance + ') - skipping cached trade'

'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âœ… CACHED TRADE SELECTED:' + '
 ðŸ“¦ Ware: ' + $bestCachedTrade.$BuyOffer.ware.name + ' (x' + $bestCachedTrade.$Amount + ')' + '
 ðŸ“ BUY from: ' + $bestCachedTrade.$BuyOffer.owner.knownname + ' @ ' + ($bestCachedTrade.$BuyPrice / 100) + ' Cr' + '
 ðŸ“ SELL to: ' + $bestCachedTrade.$SellOffer.owner.knownname + ' @ ' + ($bestCachedTrade.$SellPrice / 100) + ' Cr' + '
 ðŸš€ Distance: ' + $bestCachedTrade.$Distance + ' jumps' + '
 ðŸ’° Profit: ' + ($bestCachedTrade.$Profit / 100) + ' Cr' + '
 ðŸ“Š Efficiency: ' + $bestEfficiency + ' (' + $distancePenaltyPercent + '%, threshold: ' + $minEfficiency + ')'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âš¡ CACHE PERFORMANCE: Checked ' + $cacheEntriesChecked + '/' + $totalCacheEntries + ' entries, found ' + $validCachedTrades.count + ' valid trades'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âš¡ CACHE EARLY EXIT TRIGGERED: Performance boost of ' + $cachePerfGain + '% (saved ' + ($totalCacheEntries - $cacheEntriesChecked) + ' checks)'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') No suitable cached trade found, performing live market search'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âš No home base set in AI params or order, using ship sector: ' + $ship.sector.knownname
'[GalaxyTrader MK3] âš WARNING: Could not determine home sector for ' + $ship.knownname + ' (' + $ship.idcode + '), using current sector as fallback'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3] ðŸš¨ CRITICAL: Home sector was null for ' + $ship.knownname + ' (' + $ship.idcode + '), forcing to current sector'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') ðŸ Home base: ' + @$homeBase.knownname + ' (sector: ' + $homeSector.knownname + ') [source: ' + $homeBaseSource + '], calculating distances from home'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Merged and sorted ' + $stations.count + ' stations, now filtering by distance (max: ' + $maxDistance + ' jumps from ' + $homeSector.knownname + ')'

do_if.value: global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$Enabled and global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$TradeSearch and global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$LogLevel ge 2

debug_text.text: '[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') â›” Unreachable station (undiscovered route): ' + $station.knownname + ' in ' + $station.sector.knownname + ' - skipping'

'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âš¡ EARLY EXIT: Reached distance limit (' + $stationDistance + ' > ' + $maxDistance + ') at station ' + $i + '/' + $stations.count + ' (' + $station.knownname + ' in ' + $station.sector.knownname + ', ' + $stationDistance + ' jumps). Skipping remaining ' + ($stations.count - $i + 1) + ' stations.'

do_if.value: global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$Enabled and global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$TradeSearch and global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$LogLevel ge 2

debug_text.text: '[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Collecting offers from station ' + $i + '/' + $stations.count + ': ' + $station.knownname + ' (' + $station.idcode + ') in ' + $station.sector.knownname + ' (distance: ' + $stationDistance + ')'

do_if.value: global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$Enabled and global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$TradeSearch and global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$LogLevel ge 3 and ($buyOffers.count gt 0 or $sellOffers.count gt 0)

debug_text.text: '[GT-OFFER-COLLECTION] Station: ' + $station.knownname + '\n BuyOffers (station WANTS to buy): ' + $buyOffers.count + '\n SellOffers (station WANTS to sell): ' + $sellOffers.count

do_if.value: global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$Enabled and global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$TradeSearch and global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$LogLevel ge 2

debug_text.text: '[GT-AI] â›” OFFER FILTERED: ' + $offer.ware.name + ' (SELL) from ' + $station.knownname + ' - Reason: ' + $filterReason

do_if.value: global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$Enabled and global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$TradeSearch and global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$LogLevel ge 2

debug_text.text: '[GT-AI] â›” OFFER FILTERED: ' + $offer.ware.name + ' (BUY) from ' + $station.knownname + ' - Reason: ' + $filterReason
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') ðŸš« Filtered ' + $filteredIllegalCount + ' illegal ware offer(s) from ' + $station.knownname + ' (allowIllegal=false)'

do_if.value: global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$Enabled and global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$TradeSearch and global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$LogLevel ge 2

debug_text.text: '[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Station ' + $station.knownname + ' offers: ' + $sellOffers.count + ' sell, ' + $buyOffers.count + ' buy'

do_if.value: global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$Enabled and global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$TradeSearch and global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$LogLevel ge 2

debug_text.text: '[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Station validation failed for ' + $station.knownname
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âš¡ PERFORMANCE: Evaluated ' + $stationsEvaluated + '/' + $stations.count + ' stations (skipped ' + $stationsSkipped + ' due to distance/unreachable)'

'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') ðŸ›ï¸ FACTION PRIORITY: Foreign=' + $foreignStations.count + ', Player=' + $playerStations.count + ', Total=' + $stations.count + ' (' + $factionPriorityText + ')'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Total offers collected: ' + $allSellOffers.count + ' sell offers, ' + $allBuyOffers.count + ' buy offers'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') ðŸš« ILLEGAL WARE FILTERING: Filtered ' + $totalFilteredIllegal + ' illegal ware offer(s) (allowIllegal=' + $allowIllegal + ')'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3] ' + $ship.knownname + ' - Filtered ' + $totalFilteredIllegal + ' illegal ware offer(s) from trade search (allowIllegal=false)'

'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') === CROSS-STATION TRADE EVALUATION (OPTIMIZED) ===' + '
Sell offers: ' + $allSellOffers.count + '
Buy offers: ' + $allBuyOffers.count + '
Min ROI: ' + $minROI + '%' + '
Min Absolute Profit: ' + ($minAbsoluteProfit / 100) + ' Cr'

do_if.value: global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$Enabled and global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$TradeSearch and global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$LogLevel ge 3

debug_text.text:
'[GT-TRADE-MATCH] Evaluating trade pair:' + '
 SellOffer: ' + $sellOffer.owner.knownname + ' SELLS ' + $sellOffer.ware.name + ' @ ' + ($sellOffer.unitprice / 100) + ' Cr (Stock: ' + $sellOffer.amount + ')' + '
 BuyOffer: ' + $buyOffer.owner.knownname + ' BUYS ' + $buyOffer.ware.name + ' @ ' + ($buyOffer.unitprice / 100) + ' Cr (Wants: ' + $buyOffer.amount + ')' + '
 Trade Flow: We BUY from ' + $sellOffer.owner.knownname + ' and SELL to ' + $buyOffer.owner.knownname

do_if.value: global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$Enabled and global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$TradeSearch and global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$LogLevel ge 3

set_value.name: $passedCheck
set_value.exact: if ($roi ge $roiThreshold and $profit ge $profitThreshold) then 'âœ… PASSED' else 'âŒ REJECTED'

debug_text.text:
'[GT-PROFIT-CHECK] ' + $passedCheck + '
 Ware: ' + $sellOffer.ware.name + ' x' + $maxAmount + '
 BUY: ' + $sellOffer.owner.knownname + ' @ ' + ($buyPrice / 100) + ' Cr' + '
 SELL: ' + $buyOffer.owner.knownname + ' @ ' + ($sellPrice / 100) + ' Cr' + '
 Investment: ' + ($investment / 100) + ' Cr' + '
 Revenue: ' + ($revenue / 100) + ' Cr' + '
 Profit: ' + ($profit / 100) + ' Cr (need: ' + ($profitThreshold / 100) + ' Cr)' + '
 ROI: ' + $roi + '% (need: ' + $roiThreshold + '%)' + '
 Result: ' + (if $roi ge $roiThreshold then 'ROI OK' else 'ROI TOO LOW') + ', ' + (if $profit ge $profitThreshold then 'PROFIT OK' else 'PROFIT TOO LOW')

do_if.value: global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$Enabled and global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$TradeSearch and global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$LogLevel ge 3

debug_text.text: '[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') â›” Trade route too long: ' + $sellOffer.ware + ' (' + $totalDistance + ' jumps > max ' + $maxDistance + ') - skipping'

'[GT-Threat] ' + $ship.knownname + ' - Trade REJECTED (threat too high)
 Route: ' + $sellOffer.owner.knownname + ' -> ' + $buyOffer.owner.knownname + '
 Sectors: ' + $routeThreat.$SectorCount + ' | MaxThreat: ' + $routeThreat.$MaxThreat + ' | Tolerance: ' + ($riskTolerance + 1) + '
 Dangerous sectors: ' + $threatSectorNames

'[GT-Threat] ' + $ship.knownname + ' - Trade PENALIZED
 Route: ' + $sellOffer.owner.knownname + ' -> ' + $buyOffer.owner.knownname + '
 TotalThreat: ' + $routeThreat.$TotalThreatScore + ' | Risk Penalty: -' + ($riskPenalty / 100) + ' Cr/jump
 Efficiency: ' + ($efficiency / 100) + ' Cr/jump (after penalty)'

'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âœ… NEW BEST CROSS-STATION TRADE:' + '
 Ware: ' + $sellOffer.ware + '
 Amount: ' + $maxAmount + '
 BUY from: ' + $sellOffer.owner.knownname + ' @ ' + ($buyPrice / 100) + ' Cr' + '
 SELL to: ' + $buyOffer.owner.knownname + ' @ ' + ($sellPrice / 100) + ' Cr' + '
 Profit: ' + ($profit / 100) + ' Cr (' + $roi + '% ROI)' + '
 Distance: ' + $totalDistance + ' jumps' + '
 Efficiency: ' + ($efficiency / 100) + ' Cr/jump (' + $distancePenaltyPercent + '%)' + '
 RAW DEBUG: buyPrice=' + $buyPrice + ', sellPrice=' + $sellPrice + ', investment=' + $investment + ', revenue=' + $revenue + ', profit=' + $profit + ', roi=' + $roi
'[GT-CACHE] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âœ… Trade cached: ' + $sellOffer.ware.name + ' route (ROI=' + $roi + '%)'

'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') === CROSS-STATION EVALUATION SUMMARY ===' + '
Trades evaluated: ' + $tradesEvaluated + '
Passed filter: ' + $tradesPassedFilter + '
Passed profit: ' + $tradesPassedProfit + '
Best score: ' + $crossStationBestScore
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âœ… Best cross-station trade found! Score: ' + $crossStationBestScore + ', Profit: ' + $crossStationBestTrade.$Profit + ' Cr'

'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') === TRADE SEARCH SUMMARY ===' + '
Total stations found: ' + $stations.count + '
Stations evaluated: ' + $stationsEvaluated + '
Stations skipped (distance): ' + $stationsSkipped + ' (' + $performanceGain + '% performance gain)' + '
Total offers found: ' + $offersFound + '
Valid trades: ' + $validOffers + '
Best trade score: ' + $bestScore

'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') ðŸ“Š BEST TRADE SELECTED:' + '
 ðŸ“¦ Ware: ' + $bestTrade.$BuyOffer.ware.name + ' (x' + $bestTrade.$Amount + ')' + '
 ðŸ“ BUY from: ' + $bestTrade.$BuyOffer.owner.knownname + ' @ ' + ($bestTrade.$BuyPrice / 100) + ' Cr' + '
 ðŸ“ SELL to: ' + $bestTrade.$SellOffer.owner.knownname + ' @ ' + ($bestTrade.$SellPrice / 100) + ' Cr' + '
 ðŸš€ Distance: ' + $bestTrade.$Distance + ' jumps' + '
 ðŸ’° Profit: ' + ($bestTrade.$Profit / 100) + ' Cr' + '
 ðŸ“Š Score: ' + $bestTrade.$Score + '
 âš Risk: ' + $bestTrade.$Risk

'[GT-TRADE-SELECTION] â•â•â• SELECTED TRADE DETAILS â•â•â•' + '
 BuyOffer Source: Station SELLS to us (we buy from them)' + '
 Station: ' + $bestTrade.$BuyOffer.owner.knownname + '
 Ware: ' + $bestTrade.$BuyOffer.ware.name + '
 Amount Available: ' + $bestTrade.$BuyOffer.amount + '
 Price: ' + ($bestTrade.$BuyOffer.unitprice / 100) + ' Cr' + '
 â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€' + '
 SellOffer Target: Station BUYS from us (we sell to them)' + '
 Station: ' + $bestTrade.$SellOffer.owner.knownname + '
 Ware: ' + $bestTrade.$SellOffer.ware.name + '
 Amount Wanted: ' + $bestTrade.$SellOffer.amount + '
 Price: ' + ($bestTrade.$SellOffer.unitprice / 100) + ' Cr'
'[GT-FLEET] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âš Trade conflict detected: ' + $otherShip.knownname + ' already targeting best route. Searching alternatives...'

'[GT-FLEET] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âœ… Alternative trade selected (#' + $tradeIdx + '/' + $topTrades.count + '): ' + $candidateTrade.$BuyOffer.ware.name + ' (Score: ' + ($candidateTrade.$Score / 100) + ')'

'[GT-FLEET] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âš All ' + $topTrades.count + ' alternative trades are conflicted. Accepting best ROI trade with overlap: ' + $bestTrade.$BuyOffer.ware.name + ' (Score: ' + ($bestScore / 100) + ')'
'[GT-FLEET] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âœ… Trade reserved: ' + $bestTrade.$BuyOffer.ware.name + ' route'

'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') === NO TRADES FOUND ANALYSIS ===' + '
Ship: ' + $ship.knownname + '
Sector: ' + $ship.sector.knownname + '
Stations in range: ' + $stations.count + '
Stations evaluated: ' + $stationsEvaluated + '
Total offers: ' + $offersFound + '
Valid trades: ' + $validOffers + '
Search params: Dist=' + $maxDistance + ', MinROI=' + $minROI + '%, MinAbsoluteProfit=' + ($minAbsoluteProfit / 100) + ' Cr' + '
Ship cargo status: ' + ($ship.cargo.capacity.all - $ship.cargo.free.all) + '/' + $ship.cargo.capacity.all
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Additional info: ' + $nearbyStationsAll + ' stations within 50km of ship'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3] No profitable trades found for ' + $ship.knownname + ' (checked ' + $stationsEvaluated + ' stations, ' + $offersFound + ' offers)'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Search lock released'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') AI parameters cleaned up'

'[GalaxyTrader MK3] ' + $ship.knownname + ' executing trade for ' + ($trade.$Profit / 100) + ' Cr profit' + '
 ðŸ“¦ Ware: ' + $trade.$BuyOffer.ware.name + ' (x' + $trade.$Amount + ')' + '
 ðŸ“ BUY from: ' + $trade.$BuyOffer.owner.knownname + ' @ ' + ($trade.$BuyPrice / 100) + ' Cr' + '
 ðŸ“ SELL to: ' + $trade.$SellOffer.owner.knownname + ' @ ' + ($trade.$SellPrice / 100) + ' Cr' + '
 ðŸš€ Distance: ' + $trade.$Distance + ' jumps' + '
 ðŸ’° Profit: ' + ($trade.$Profit / 100) + ' Cr' + '
 ðŸ“Š Score: ' + $trade.$Score

'[GT-VALIDATION] â•â•â• TRADE OFFER VALIDATION â•â•â•' + '
 BuyOffer Type: ' + typeof $trade.$BuyOffer + '
 BuyOffer Available: ' + $trade.$BuyOffer.available + '
 BuyOffer Amount: ' + $trade.$BuyOffer.amount + '
 BuyOffer Station: ' + $trade.$BuyOffer.owner.knownname + '
 BuyOffer Ware: ' + $trade.$BuyOffer.ware.name + '
 BuyOffer Price: ' + ($trade.$BuyOffer.unitprice / 100) + ' Cr' + '
 â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€' + '
 SellOffer Type: ' + typeof $trade.$SellOffer + '
 SellOffer Available: ' + $trade.$SellOffer.available + '
 SellOffer Amount: ' + $trade.$SellOffer.amount + '
 SellOffer Station: ' + $trade.$SellOffer.owner.knownname + '
 SellOffer Ware: ' + $trade.$SellOffer.ware.name + '
 SellOffer Price: ' + ($trade.$SellOffer.unitprice / 100) + ' Cr' + '
 â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€' + '
 BuyOffer Valid: ' + $buyOfferValid + '
 SellOffer Valid: ' + $sellOfferValid
'[GalaxyTrader MK3] âš Trade offer(s) no longer valid for ' + $ship.knownname + ' - BuyOffer valid: ' + $buyOfferValid + ', SellOffer valid: ' + $sellOfferValid
'[GalaxyTrader MK3] âš Ship ' + $ship.knownname + ' cannot carry ware ' + $ware.name + ' - aborting trade'

'[GalaxyTrader MK3] ðŸš« ILLEGAL WARE BLOCKED: ' + $ship.knownname + ' attempted to trade ' + $ware.name + ' (illegal in ' + $illegalContext + ': ' + $illegalZone.knownname + ') with allowIllegal=false - trade aborted'

'[GalaxyTrader MK3] âš INSUFFICIENT FUNDS: ' + $ship.knownname + ' needs ' + ($tradeCost / 100) + ' Cr but only has ' + ($availableMoney / 100) + ' Cr available (money source: ' + $moneySource + ') - trade aborted'

'[GT-ORDER-DEBUG] â•â•â• CREATING TRADE ORDERS â•â•â•' + '
 Order 1 (BUY): tradeoffer type=' + typeof $trade.$BuyOffer + '
 Station: ' + $trade.$BuyOffer.owner.knownname + '
 Ware: ' + $trade.$BuyOffer.ware.name + '
 Amount: ' + $trade.$Amount + '
 Available: ' + $trade.$BuyOffer.available + '
 Offer Amount: ' + $trade.$BuyOffer.amount + '
 â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€' + '
 Order 2 (SELL): tradeoffer type=' + typeof $trade.$SellOffer + '
 Station: ' + $trade.$SellOffer.owner.knownname + '
 Ware: ' + $trade.$SellOffer.ware.name + '
 Amount: ' + $trade.$Amount + '
 Available: ' + $trade.$SellOffer.available + '
 Offer Amount: ' + $trade.$SellOffer.amount
'[GT-AI] âœ… Trade orders created for ' + $ship.knownname + ' (ID: ' + $ship.idcode + ')'

'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') TradePerform orders created:' + '
 BUY: ' + $trade.$Amount + ' ' + $trade.$BuyOffer.ware + ' from ' + $trade.$BuyOffer.owner.knownname + '
 SELL: ' + $trade.$Amount + ' ' + $trade.$SellOffer.ware + ' to ' + $trade.$SellOffer.owner.knownname + '
 Expected profit: ' + ($trade.$Profit / 100) + ' Cr'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3] FALLBACK: Registering ship ' + $gtShip.knownname + ' (' + $gtShip.idcode + ') in GT_Ships registry during trade completion'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3] ' + $gtShip.knownname + ' (' + $gtShip.idcode + ') BOUGHT ' + $trade.transferredamount + ' ' + $trade.ware + ' for ' + ($price / 100) + ' Cr'

'[GalaxyTrader MK3] ' + $gtShip.knownname + ' (' + $gtShip.idcode + ') SOLD ' + $trade.transferredamount + ' ' + $trade.ware + ' for ' + ($price / 100) + ' Cr (Trade #' + global.$GT_Ships.{$gtShip}.$TradesCompleted + ', Total Profit: ' + (global.$GT_Ships.{$gtShip}.$TotalProfit / 100) + ' Cr)'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3] ' + $gtShip.knownname + ' (' + $gtShip.idcode + ') completed full trade cycle - signaling AI script'
'[GT-FLEET] (' + $gtShip.idcode + ') âœ… Trade reservation released'
'[GT-AutoRepair] (' + $gtShip.idcode + ') Trade completed - Hull at ' + $gtShip.hullpercentage + '% (damaged) - checking auto-repair eligibility'
'[GT-AutoRepair] (' + $gtShip.idcode + ') Trade completed - Hull at ' + $gtShip.hullpercentage + '% (healthy) - no repair needed'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3] ' + $gtShip.knownname + ' (' + $gtShip.idcode + ') completed sell operation - signaling AI script'
'[GT-AutoRepair] (' + $gtShip.idcode + ') Trade completed - Hull at ' + $gtShip.hullpercentage + '% (damaged) - checking auto-repair eligibility'
'[GT-AutoRepair] (' + $gtShip.idcode + ') Trade completed - Hull at ' + $gtShip.hullpercentage + '% (healthy) - no repair needed'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3] Route cache cleared'

do_if.value: not $wareCache? or typeof $wareCache != datatype.table or not $wareCache.keys?
not $sellCache? or typeof $sellCache != datatype.table or not $sellCache.keys?

debug_text.text: '[GalaxyTrader MK3] Trade cache cleanup: removed ' + $cleanedEntries + ' old entries'
'[GT-FLEET] Cleaned up ' + $shipsToRemove.count + ' stale trade reservations'

'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') === SELL SEARCH START ===' + '
Ship: ' + $ship.knownname + '
Current Sector: ' + $ship.sector.knownname + '
Max Distance: ' + $maxDistance + ' jumps' + '
Min Profit: ' + $minProfit + ' Cr'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3] ' + $ship.knownname + ' found sell opportunity: ' + $bestAmount + ' ' + $bestOffer.ware + ' for ' + $bestPrice + ' Cr at ' + $bestOffer.owner.knownname
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') TradePerform order created for ' + $bestAmount + ' ' + $bestOffer.ware + ' at ' + $bestOffer.owner.knownname
'[GalaxyTrader MK3] ' + $ship.knownname + ' found no profitable sell opportunities (best price: ' + $bestPrice + ' vs min: ' + $minProfit + ')'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3] ' + $ship.knownname + ' has no cargo to sell'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') AI parameters cleaned up (sell search)'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3] Recovering idle ship: ' + $ship.knownname
'[GalaxyTrader MK3] Cleaned up ' + $staleLocks + ' stale search locks'

do_if.value: global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$Enabled and global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$TradeSearch and global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$LogLevel ge 2

debug_text.text:
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') === EVALUATING OFFERS ===' + '
Station: ' + $station.knownname + '
Sell offers: ' + $sellOffers.count + '
Buy offers: ' + $buyOffers.count + '
Min ROI: ' + $minROI + '% Min Absolute Profit: ' + ($minAbsoluteProfit / 100) + ' Cr'

do_if.value: global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$Enabled and global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$TradeSearch and global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$LogLevel ge 2

debug_text.text: '[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Evaluating station ' + $i + '/' + $stations.count + ': ' + $station.knownname + ' (' + $station.idcode + ') in ' + $station.sector.knownname

do_if.value: global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$Enabled and global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$TradeSearch and global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$LogLevel ge 2

debug_text.text: '[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Station ' + $station.knownname + ' offers: ' + $sellOffers.count + ' sell, ' + $buyOffers.count + ' buy'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Better trade found! Score: ' + global.$GT_EvaluateResult.$Score + ', Profit: ' + global.$GT_EvaluateResult.$Profit + ' Cr'

do_if.value: global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$Enabled and global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$TradeSearch and global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$LogLevel ge 2

debug_text.text: '[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Station validation failed for ' + $station.knownname

do_if.value: global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$Enabled and global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$TradeSearch and global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$LogLevel ge 2

debug_text.text:
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') === STATION EVALUATION SUMMARY ===' + '
Trades evaluated: ' + $tradesEvaluated + '
Passed filter: ' + $tradesPassedFilter + '
Passed profit: ' + $tradesPassedProfit + '
